title: Would I get banned for this?
body:
Hi all,

I was wondering would I be going against Riot's Policys/Terms if I were to use a custom skin? For example Box Box's Box Riven Skin.
Could I get banned or suspended for using a custom skin?

Example
http://scontent.cdninstagram.com/t51.2885-15/e35/13397641_1799701940260609_695277656_n.jpg?ig_cache_key=MTI3NTIyNDk3MTA5MzU4NjcwMA%3D%3D.2]

TIA <3

replies.body: Currently, there is no explicit ban on aesthetic modifications. However, the systems Riot use to detect third party programs and client modifications can't always accurately identify the difference between an aesthetic mod/program and a gameplay one, so it's still entirely possible to be banned for using such things. Riot has stated it's a "use at your own risk" situation.
You won't get banned for Custom skins, Riot allows it dw, you can use that Box Box skin if you want :)

Thankyou all! <3

One last thing, If I used the skin for a week say, and then I stopped using it and unistalled the software etc. Later during season season 7 
> round mid S7 they would make it officially bannable,

would I get banned?

If you stop using it *before* it becomes officially bannable, you should be fine. Though, I'd suggest keeping an eye out for any news relating to it, as they may decide to apply it retroactively up to a certain point.

You don't (currently, they did say it can happen(as in maybe/maybe not), and they announced around mid S7 they would make it officially bannable, the custom skins are also currently bannable if they give any advantage to the player using it, say the animation is cleaner and easier for the player to read the map or it increases model size by a margin.

No, because it doesn't do anything to the champion or the game it's just a visual that only you can see. But I'm not sure if they have deleted the files for people to do custom skins with as they said they are planning to remove those files
